Articles.Content:
Hey there, KSP modding community. I remember long time ago when KSP used to be 0.10 there was a steampunk texturepack, but it exists no longer. I do not know how to texture parts which have no texture file, and, i'm not THAT good at texturing things. So i ask you please, if you would be able to make a texture pack which includes wood, brass, a lot of brass, some golden paint and pretty shiney bolts, i would be delighted, and i guess not only me.

With respect

Plymouth.
I'm frankly sorry for posting a thread into the wrong forum. Mods, could you please send it to "suggestions" forum and delete this message?
AFAIK you can't import .mbm textures to any program, so you'd need the original files from the devs.
